tool_description: Download / Scrape data from Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn, DailyMotion, Likee, TikTok, etc.
name: All Media Downloader

api_list.name: Scrape Data
api_list.description: There is only one endpoint. To make things much easier on your side. Send a `GET` request with the URL of what you want to download/scrape.
